text: You had an idea. It started yesterday with a glimmer. What was it? Right. Claude remembered it. Your idea was hungry. Hungry for answers and connections. Claude helped you look, reading alongside you. Turn this into what? A deck, spreadsheets, documents, the tedious parts handled. Your idea stopped being just words and slides. It became entries, updates, actions, real things in real places. You kept going. You left your desk. Your idea followed into your phone. Calendar for when, maps for where, reminders for later. By evening, it was done. The idea was always yours. With Claude as your thinking partner, you made it real.
